created_time: October 25, 2022, 04:01:55 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 09:13:20 AM by Lezzz
content: ATLAS NAVIDRIVE TO EARN | A.I. NAVIGATION APP | MARKETPLACEMISSIONInnovative global navigation app powered by A.I. and BlockchainMarketplace for vehicle brands to sell digital assets (3D vehicles and brand engagement experiences)Connect vehicle brands directly with usersHelp vehicle brands transcend traditional advertising restrictionsIMPLEMENTATIONAtlas Navi app is a Drive to Earn navigation app with A.I. thatuses the smartphone camera / dashcam to get you to your destination and avoid traffic by detecting:road conditionsaccidentstraffic in each lanepolice vehiclesavailable parking spacesAnd in exchange to the data that you bring to the network, you are getting a rewardFounder & CEOGeorge Grama, a serial entrepreneur who founded multiple software products over the last 12 years,including GroupDeals, Pandoria, Star Taxi, Mondo Ride, Autonomy Chain, Flag Mobility,  SoftBit Technologies, A.I. Deter and invested in many others.Some of these companies went on to raise more than $20M combined from various investors. His experience lies in the transportation software industry, including two successful exits in the space when the companies were acquired by bigger competitors.​George is also an Expert Advisor for the European Union on transportation, smart-city & connected vehicles legislation and policies. He is passionate about blockchain, cybersecurity autonomous vehicles and enjoys building software that others are very passionate about.Referall code: pgywgzHey Guys! In order to install the navigation app you will need a referral code from an existing member.Feel free to ask me anything and I'll answer the best I can, Thank you and drive safe LINKSWEBSITEPRESENTATIONTELEGRAM

comments.author: Lezzz
comments.body: Latest update⚡️Tesla NFTs — Licensed Car Brands in Atlas Navi AppAtlas Navi has been hard at work for the past 2 years. One of the most important achievements of that work is securing licensed car NFTs for our users.Targeting NFTs of Every Major Car BrandNFTs of world-famous Tesla cars will be available in the Atlas Navi app, available to the global user base.This exciting feature is expected to push adoption for both the project and crypto as a whole. Our exponential user growth coupled with deals with major car brands put us on the track to becoming the most used crypto app ever.Tesla is only the first of 12 major car brands to be released. Invite your friends for this rare opportunity!
